author: kkrajczar
body: This PR is a workaround to the "RuntimeError: An entry in sequence tracksValidationFS has no label" error observed in recent IBs for HI Validation. That problem seems to be caused by PR #7175 (main authors are @Dr15Jones and @davidlange6). Please see other comments in that PR, PR #7175 .
title: Change the track associator in HI Track Validation
